DOC.brief_title: Capecitabine Treating Patients With Advanced Recurrent Squamous Cell Carcinoma Skin
DOC.detailed_description: Participants receive 500 mg/m² capecitabine orally ( PO ) twice daily ( BID ) day 1 14 . Courses repeat every 21 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . After completion study treatment , patient follow 2 year .
